content.text:
# Zenoria schwarzi

Zenoria schwarzi is a species of beetle of the family Coccinellidae. It is found in Panama.
Description
Adults reach a length of about 2.95â€“3.10 mm. Adults are pale yellow. The pronotum has a black median basal projection and the elytron has a large dark metallic green spot, as well as a small oval dark red spot in the centre of the green spot. The pronotum has some yellowish white hairs, while the elytron is covered with them.
